title: Baking Soda for the Long Haul: How Bicarb Became the Latest Must-Have of Endurance
content:
Sodium bicarbonate was once seen as a gut-crushing gain for short-form athletes. Fresh studies and a wave of new products are changing that.

Read the full article at Baking Soda for the Long Haul: How Bicarb Became the Latest Must-Have of Endurance on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
